author: Ed Greenwood
comment: Downloaded, got notification on watch (Huawei 1) about 2 hours later that face was available. However next day still no sign of watch face on either phone or android app. Strange thing is only way I could uninstall was search for app in play store. No app in app folder on phone.  Shame as it looks good but given other reviews I'm not the only person to have issues.

reply.author: Martin Halachev
reply.content: Hi, Ed! In most cases users’ issues were not related to the watch face itself. Instead, they were caused by sync and connectivity problems between the phone and the watch. Please refer to the FAQ section of the app description or contact me so I could try to provide assistance. Thanks!

author: Tj H
comment: Amazing. Just one thing: can I have an option to make the dots bigger even with huge selected there's tones of wasted space and the dots are too small

reply.author: Martin Halachev
reply.content:
Thank you!
Regarding dots size, please specify your smartwatch manufacturer/model (either here or via email) so I could research the issue.

author: Gabor Kozma
comment: Very nice watchface! It took me some time though to find in the FAQ that I had to install it from my watch under Android Ware 2.0.

author: Ivan Heimsath
comment: Awesome face, but I can't put the wachface's style in vertical way. Just horizontal! Could u change it? Thx

reply.author: Martin Halachev
reply.content: Ivan, could you please describe what do you mean by "style in vertical way"? The whole watch face (while rotating the watch) or just the binary dot lines? Thx

author: ABHISEK
comment: I have installed it 5 times already and still don't find it in my Android Wear watch faces or on my ZenWatch 3. Not sure what's wrong here? Help.

reply.author: Martin Halachev
reply.content: The watch face shall appear on both devices (Android Wear app on phone and the watch itself) once it gets transferred from the phone to the smartwatch. This may take some time.

author: Pissasa P
comment: Being a Computer Science major, I love this, especially if someone asks what time it is and I show them the answer in just plain binary format, and smile.

author: Matthew Straub
comment: I have the watch installed, but it's not showing up under android wear 2.0. Using galaxy s8+

reply.author: Martin Halachev
reply.content: Hi Matthew, you should be able to install it via the new on-watch Play Store.

author: Raul Arevalo
comment: Great, but please add an option to make 8,4,2,1 on the Y axis. See "binary watch face for geeks" as an example.

author: Shannon Kane
comment: It's OK I wish the app would open on my phone. But it works.

author: Maddie Smith
comment: Easy to install on my android watch,  works well and has good custom display options

author: Thomas Berger
comment: Developer is awesome, watch face is awesome too!... Not much else to add, is there?

reply.author: Martin Halachev
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback!

author: C Con
comment: Five stars because of the many customization choices, stable, beautiful

reply.author: Martin Halachev
reply.content: Thank you!

comment: Great watch face!!! Thank you:)

author: onraa
comment: No

author: jarryd stetler
comment: I don't know if it was an update or what but every time I look at my watch after like 10 minutes or so it changes my settings and puts numbers in the background. Which completely ruins the point of the watch as I don't have to figure out the time.. Please let me know of a fix or something.. Otherwise I still love the look and everything else.

reply.author: Martin Halachev
reply.content:
Thanks! The watch face supports interactive actions. Touching the screen toggles background time, while a tap in the center toggles bit numbers visibility. Please make sure that these settings were not accidentally toggled, for example while swiping cards.
This behavior can be disabled by switching off Touch features in Watch face settings.

title: Keeps changing my settings.

author: David Pansch
comment: I like the design, but I can't stand the dot matrix look of the ambient mode! Would like the same (just without seconds) look for ambiance. For that reason I don't use it. Sorry.

reply.author: Martin Halachev
reply.content:
The checkered fills in ambient mode are designed for power efficiency and screen protection, the latter being directed towards devices with OLED screens.
An optional alternate ambient mode featuring solid colors (suitable for IPS LCD screens) might be considered for upcoming releases.

author: Dave Compton
comment: I finally purchased a SmartWatch to replace my aging Samui Moon 'The One' binary watch. This app ticks all the boxes thanks to 24h Nerd Mode with interactive features off.  Less is more 8¬]

reply.author: Martin Halachev
reply.content: Thank you for your review!

author: Juan Sauceda
comment: Please add color (blue, yellow, red, green, white, orange) to dots only.  Awesome app!  Update: Thanks for the feature request!

reply.author: Martin Halachev
reply.content: Thank you! Multiple colors have been introduced with the latest update.

title: Awesome!!!

comment: Exemplary work. The battery life of my watch lasts twice as long. I'm practising mental arithmetic each time (no pun intended) I look at the watch. Thank You for your contribution to PlayStore.

reply.author: Martin Halachev
reply.content: Thank you for your review!

author: Dale Hubbard
comment: Minimalist for the complete nerd plus non-nerd enhancements as required. Thank you!
title: Just excellent

comment: Beautiful, simplified and a little geek. Using it and I loved it. Powerful settings give you flexible choices to customize whatever you like to present on the watch.

reply.author: Martin Halachev
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback!

comment: Great watch face! and it has a lot of funny options: date and battery format :)

comment: Works,no ads,and options.
title: Binary Clock Live Watch

reply.author: Martin Halachev
reply.content: The LG G Watch W100 initially ships with Android 4.4W. Please make sure that it's firmware is updated to Android Wear 5.0 or later version, which adds custom watch faces support.

title: Superb

comment: Outstanding watch face, my favourite by far. Works wonderfully except a small issue where I turn odd number in background and it turns back on again few hours later. Happened a number of times. Despite that I highly recommend this!

reply.author: Martin Halachev
reply.content:
Thank you! Regarding the numbers in the background, please note that
the watch face supports interactive actions. 
Touching the screen toggles background time, while a tap in the center toggles bit numbers visibility.This behavior can be disabled by switching off Touch features in Watch face settings.

title: Outstanding

author: Dorian Martinez Preciado
comment: Love it! Is there any way to lock it on the nerd mode? Every time I touch the screen the numbers appear (bit values and time).

reply.author: Martin Halachev
reply.content: Thank you! Interactive actions can be disabled by switching off Touch features in Watch face settings.

author: Michael Scovell
comment: I just wish it could show the weather, otherwise it's great!  I like how the Ambient mode looks especially, and the amount of customization is much higher than other binary watch faces I've looked at.

author: sagir shaikh
comment: I have download the app twice but where the app goes in phone I couldn't find it.. Please help

reply.author: Martin Halachev
reply.content:
The app is designed for use with Android Wear smartwatches.  
It is accessible via the Android Wear companion app, instead of a stand-alone launcher icon.

author: Johan Gradén
comment: Really nice watch face with a lot of options!
title: Awesome!

author: Albert Argimon Pla
comment: this face clock is awesome
title: amazing

author: Justin Fleming
comment: Clean interface, plus I can see the date and battery life if I choose to.  The only thing missing for me is weather which is not really the theme of the face anyways, but that would make it the perfect face for me if it was ever to be added.  Another feature that wold be nice is if the dots were a little more customizable (color and size changes are already available), but now I'm getting nit picky.

author: Phillip Berry
comment: Best binary watch face I have found. The watch face and options are wonderfully designed. The checkered fill in ambient mode does detract from its elegance, but it is more than likely to preserve battery life. Samsung Gear Live.

reply.author: Martin Halachev
reply.content: Thank you for your comment! Regarding the fills in ambient mode, in addition to power efficiency, they are also designed for screen protection.

title: Beautiful Watch Face

author: Adrian Fishler
comment: Great design, excellent customizability, NO battery drain.
title: Perfect
